title: Vase, 1981
markings: On underside, stamped: "Theresia", in script / maker's initials TH HV / city mark "L" / standard marks (2 )/ 925 / date mark for 1981.
creditline: Gift of Foreningen for Nutilda Svenskt Silver
description: Straight-sided oblong vase with front and back sides with double curves, soldered in straight line at outer edges of curves to form sharp upright ribs.  Flat polished surface, flat base following shape of sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, 1981.
1981. Silver. Gift of Foreningen for Nutilda Svenskt Silver. 1982-67-2.
